name: Miyamoto Musashi quote
description: "There is nothing outside of yourself that can ever enable you to get better, stronger, richer, quicker, or smarter. Everything is within. Everything exists. Seek nothing outside of yourself."

name: The 80/20 Rule
description: 80% of your results will come from just 20% of your tasks, and the small results will come from the other 80% of "small" tasks. You can also do the 20% of tasks and outsource the other 80%. Chances are your competition is trying to do a mix of both so you can absolutely obliterate them.

name: Forsee your potential failures
description: Visualizing failure/obstacles it'll actually help us dramatically because it'll lets us prepare for the potential obstacles that could come our when on the way to our goals. (Visualize someone coming into your room when you're trying to focus and how you would deal with it. Visualize getting sucked into YouTube and wasting 3 hours watching pointless videos. Now mentally rehearse how you would overcome that.)
